title: H E L P ! cant load Android system - Pixel 2XL
content:
HI everyone! I suddenly got a black screen on my pixel 2XL,  saying it can't load the android system and that data may be corrupt and may need to reset. I haven't made any changes to the phone prior to this and it worked perfectly.
the only thing I remember is that it was waiting to restart after a version update (but I didnt perform the restart). 
I installed the Google USB driver so it would recognize it and hopefully get into fastboot. (ran it via cmd - Win7, 64 bit)
when in 'Recovery Mode', I got the little green fella on his back with 'No command' messgae.
Pressed Power + power up but nothing happens.
Is there anything I can do to correct it without data resetting the system?
Would love to hear any advice!
Cheers
Benny
